unittitle_ssm: New York City Congregational Church Association ecclesiastical council minutes
abstract_ssm: The minutes from 1868 to 1954 include resolutions and document proceedings regarding the establishment of congregations, ordinations, enstatements and dismissals of clergy, and investigations into church matters in Brooklyn and New York City Congregational churches.
